name: Savior Angels
description:
You are the angel of Epsilon Pegasi, brightest star in the northern constellation of Pegasus and your duty is to make your star live longest amongst the other two.

Collect as many water as you can and bring them to your star.

Release wormholes to send other angels away from you.

But don't forget, they can do the same.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Spacebar - Release wormhole
